Text:
I really think this is awsome.
One thing though, Crystar #5, and Power Man and Iron Fist v 1 #93 
have Brocken Archive errors. 
I tried pulling those two twice now and I get the same error.
Are the files damaged?

Omaddox, do you mean the message "files missing from checksum list"? If you press okay you can read the comic as normal.

Or is there some other problem?
